column5: this element shall be present in every rt dose iod.  for brto, this element shall be restricted to axial images only.  for an axial image, direction cosines shall be ( 1, 0, 0, 0,  1, 0) with an angle tolerance of 0.001 radians (~0.057 degrees)
for ct, non-isotropic pixels are outside the scope of the profile. for rt dose, pixel spacing may be non-isotropic.
